OOC:Astroblast has almost left the CF air space.

::Astroblast::
Kluster's missile jets buy a ready Astroblast, as he continues to 
leave CF airspace.


On 26 Feb 2001, at 19:50, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> Is Astroblast still reaching for Firearm after being hit?
> 
> ::Firearm/Kluster::
> 
> All the shots on Firearm are successful, the robot remaining laying on 
> the shields in stasis lock and roasting slowly.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster rolls out of the way of Astroblast's shots, firing back with a 
> missile. He hoped that the Decepticons would get away from Firearm so 
> that he could drop him through the shields.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> > ((I'm not sure this is up to date my mail is kinda screwed up. If 
> its not 
> > tell me and I'll repost.Excuse grammer.))
> > 
> > ::The LA2::
> > LA2 swing around wide as it enters the CF air defense zone.
> > 
> > ::Liono::
> > Liono swings open the dock bay doors and draws Spark Reaver((Sword)) 
> > activating the Plasma edge and jumps out of the LA2. Liono uses all 
> his 
> > power to swing the Spark Reaver at Right side of Mensor's Wrist on 
> the arm 
> > reaching for Firearm. "Hands OFF!"
> > 
> > ::Dark::
> > Dark draws his beam sword and follows behind Liono swings around to 
> the left 
> > side. Dark Swings the with all his power trying to help Liono swings 
> at 
> > Mensor's  Wrist on the left side on the hand reaching for Firearm. 
> "Like my 
> > little brother said Hands off."
> > 
> > ::Koj::
> > "Can't let you have all the fun" Shoots 25 chains 15 trying to wrap 
> around 
> > Mensors fingers the other 10 trying to Wrap up Firearm. As Koj jumps 
> out of 
> > the shuttle.
> > 
> > ::Tiamat & Inu::
> > Both Tiamat and Inu-Yasha fire 4 meduim sized Fireballs balls and 
> cone of 
> > Acid at Astrotrain. ((That mean 8 fire balls and twin cones of 
> acid.))
> > 
> > ::Lilly::
> > "Go meet Wildwing I'll make sure Liono ,Koj and Dark stay out of 
> trouble." 
> > Lilly Loads her Bow and Fires 8 high power Proton arrows at 
> Astrotrain 
> > thrusters as she exits the LA2.
> > 
> > ::LA2::
> > The LA2 takes off heading to meet Wildwing
> >
